thread.title: Balogun Salutes Eagles’ Killer Spirit Against Cameroon
thread.title_full: Balogun Salutes Eagles’ Killer Spirit Against Cameroon

author: Prince Imehiron
title: Balogun Salutes Eagles’ Killer Spirit Against Cameroon
text:
Headlines , Top Stories 
David Meshioye: 
Super Eagles and Mainz FC centre back, Leon Balogun has hailed the team's ability to bounce back from a 2-0 defeat by DR Congo to maul the Indomitable Lions of Cameroon 3-0 in Brussels, Belgium on Sunday, Completesportsnigeria.com reports. 
Balogun showered encomium on his teammates through his Twitter handle, for their self belief and professionalism, adding that the players failed to drop their heads after the 2-0 loss to Congo DR last Thursday. 
Balogun tweeted: “Impressive performance! That's how you bounce back! Thx for all the love, but there's only one star – the TEAM,” he said. 
The Sunday Oliseh’s men got their first goal from an unlikely source, Efe Ambrose, then impressive Moses Simon and Odion Ighalo. 
The Super Eagles were far more impressive than they were against Congo, dominating proceedings from the kick off
